summary.title: Summary
summary.text: Front-end developer with 6 years of experience in software programming. Strong knowledge of JavaScript and related Frameworks. Experience with remote geographically distributed team. Has good soft skills, goal-oriented, perfect team-player.

react.visual: React Hooks, Functional Components, Styled Components

investing.description: Building customer-facing consumer web and mobile applications.Build architecture of project. Troubleshooting, finding optimal solutions.
investing.technologies: TypeScript, React, Redux, Styled Components, Express.JS, RESTful API, Sequelize, Docker.

pragma.description: Work on Cryptocurrency projects. Communication with the client. Building an application architecture, introducing new ideas. Work on team, communicate,  finde resolve problems. Suggestions for improving current solutions.

acropolium.description: Training by the company for the position. Create and modify Front-end projects. API creation and database setup. Construction of the program architecture, implementation of new ideas. Improving both yourself and new employees. Communication with the client.
